foreignData.name: Domestizierung
foreignData.text:
Kreaturenverzauberung
Du kontrollierst die verzauberte Kreatur.
Ist zu Beginn deines Endsegments die Stärke der verzauberten Kreatur 4 oder höher, opfere die Domestizierung.

foreignData.name: Domesticación
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura.
Tú controlas la criatura encantada.
Al comienzo de tu paso final, si la fuerza de la criatura encantada es 4 o más, sacrifica la Domesticación.

foreignData.name: Domestication
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : créature
Vous contrôlez la créature enchantée.
Au début de votre étape de fin, si la force de la créature enchantée est supérieure ou égale à 4, sacrifiez la Domestication.

foreignData.name: Addomesticare
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura
Controlli la creatura incantata.
All'inizio della tua sottofase finale, se la forza della creatura incantata è pari o superiore a 4, sacrifica Addomesticare.

foreignData.name: 家畜化
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
あなたはエンチャントされているクリーチャーをコントロールする。
あなたの終了ステップの開始時に、エンチャントされているクリーチャーのパワーが４以上である場合、家畜化を生け贄に捧げる。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: Domesticação
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura
Você controla a criatura encantada.
No início de sua etapa final, se o poder da criatura encantada for maior ou igual a 4, sacrifique Domesticação.

foreignData.name: Одомашнивание
foreignData.text:
Зачаровать существо
Вы контролируете зачарованное существо.
В начале вашего заключительного шага, если сила зачарованного существа равна 4 или больше, пожертвуйте Одомашнивание.

foreignData.name: 驯化
foreignData.text:
结附于生物
你操控所结附的生物。
在你的结束步骤开始时，若所结附的生物之力量为4或更多，则牺牲驯化。

name: Domestication
originalText:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, sacrifice Domestication.

rulings.text: Domestication’s triggered ability has an “intervening ‘if’ clause.” That means (1) the ability triggers only if the enchanted creature’s power is 4 or greater as your end step begins, and (2) the ability does nothing if the enchanted creature’s power is 3 or less by the time it resolves.
Domestication can target, and can enchant, a creature with power 4 or greater. The enchanted creature’s power is checked only when the triggered ability triggers and resolves.
If an effect changes the enchanted creature’s power until end of turn, it will still have the modified power during your end step.

text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, sacrifice Domestication.
